CustomField.formula: IF( $Setup.SPARTADMS__DMS_App_Setting__c.SPARTADMS__Enable_Document_Type_Auto_Numbering__c , SPARTADMS__Document_Auto_Number__c ,(SUBSTITUTE(RIGHT( TEXT(SPARTADMS__Document_Department__c) , LEN(TEXT(SPARTADMS__Document_Department__c))- FIND("(",TEXT(SPARTADMS__Document_Department__c))),')','')) & "-" & SPARTADMS__Document_Auto_Number__c & "-" & (SUBSTITUTE(RIGHT( TEXT(SPARTADMS__Document_Type__c) , LEN(TEXT(SPARTADMS__Document_Type__c))- FIND("(",TEXT(SPARTADMS__Document_Type__c))),')','')))
CustomField.label: Document Number
